meta.title: The Wall Project
meta.description: The Wall Project - Browser addon and Android app to detect and block over 19,000 Israeli-connected websites and their social media accounts. Same database, works offline.
meta.keywords: The Wall, browser addon, Android app, website blocker, boycott assistant, Israeli websites, social media blocking, Chrome extension, Firefox addon, Google Play

intro.text: Detect and block more than {{count}} Israeli-related websites and their social accounts. Available as a browser addon and an Android app.

chrome.title: Click to download for Chrome
chrome.subtitle: Also for Brave, Edge and Kiwi for Android!

safari.title: Click to download for Safari desktop

ios.title: Click to download for Safari for iOS
ios.subtitle: for iPhone and iPad

telegram.title: Join our Telegram channel for updates

downloads.alsoAvailable: Also available for Safari and Firefox

testimonial.quote: The most seamless and awesome plugin I've ever used! It has informed me about a lot of companies that I stopped using.
testimonial.author: Abdo Wahba

footer.copyright: Â© 2025 The Wall. All Rights Reserved.

newsletter.subscribeDescription: Sign up for news and special offers. Unsubscribe anytime!

installOnce.title: Install once, works forever
installOnce.description: Install the browser addon or the Android app. Anytime you encounter an Israeli-connected company, you will see "the wall" instead.

worksEverywhere.title: Works everywhere!
worksEverywhere.description: Browser addon for Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Brave, Opera and Safari. Android app for full phone protection. Same database everywhere!

smartDetection.title: Smart detection
smartDetection.description: Detects websites and also their related LinkedIn, Twitter and Facebook accounts. More platforms coming soon.

trustedData.title: Trusted data
trustedData.description: The main source of the data is the latest Crunchbase list of companies with headquarters in Israel. Also companies with a founder or investor from Israel. More data like BDS list coming soon. The addon will show the reason.

donate.title: Support The Wall
donate.description: Help us maintain and improve The Wall. Your support enables us to keep everything free, update the database regularly, and add new features. Every contribution makes a difference!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: To provide the best service, we ONLY track a very limited number of events.
privacy.noData: WE WILL NEVER COLLECT USER IDENTIFYING DATA NOR NAVIGATION HISTORY!
privacy.eventsTracked: Those are the events we track:
privacy.event1: When the Wall appears (to ensure the addon works as expected, and to count the number for encouraging others in the future)
privacy.event2: When the Wall's share, continue, or report buttons are clicked (to study the performance of design changes etc.)

browserAddon.title: Browser Addon
browserAddon.subtitle: Install in your browser for instant protection while you browse

androidApp.title: Android App
androidApp.subtitle: Full protection on your Android device
androidApp.description: Get The Wall app on your Android phone for full protection. Same trusted database, works offline. Always up to date.

sections.alsoGetApp: Also available as an Android app
